sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"setup"}}>{`Setup`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"configure-your-environment"}}>{`Configure your environment`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Add the following environment variables to your bash profile for local development and/or your `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`.env or Dockerfile for production.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash"}}>{`export REFLEX_API_KEY=...
export REFLEX_APP_NAME=...
export INBOX=https://\${REFLEX_APP_NAME}.ds.bhhsresource.com/inbox/
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"install-httpie-cli"}}>{`Install HTTPie CLI`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The following examples use `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://httpie.org"}}>{`httpie`}</MDXTag>{`.  Follow the link for installation instructions.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"create-an-application-inbox"}}>{`Create an application inbox`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can create a inbox for your application by HTTP GET to a new inbox with your API key in the request header.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Note: this first request may take up to 1 minute to return a response while your inbox is created.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash"}}>{`http -v \$INBOX x-api-key:\$REFLEX_API_KEY
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`RESPONSE`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-http"}}>{`GET /inbox/ HTTP/1.1
Host: {REFLEX_APP_NAME}.ds.bhhsresource.com
x-api-key: {REFLEX_API_KEY}

HTTP/1.1 200
Connection: keep-alive
Content-Length: 64
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Date: Mon, 10 Sep 2018 05:20:19 GMT
X-Request-Id: 8bc56b7f-9733-4a7c-a02e-4cf746e7c9f9

{
    "contains": [],
    "id": "https://\${REFLEX_APP_NAME}.ds.bhhsresource.com/inbox/"
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"send-a-message"}}>{`Send a message`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Publish inbox messages with HTTP POST.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash"}}>{`http -v POST \$INBOX x-api-key:\$REFLEX_API_KEY foo=bar
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`RESPONSE`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-http"}}>{`POST /inbox/ HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json, */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Connection: keep-alive
Content-Length: 24
Content-Type: application/json
Host: \${REFLEX_APP_NAME}.ds.bhhsresource.com
User-Agent: HTTPie/0.9.9
x-api-key: \${REFLEX_API_KEY}

{
    "foo": "bar"
}

HTTP/1.1 200
Connection: keep-alive
Content-Length: 2
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Date: Mon, 10 Sep 2018 05:27:22 GMT
X-Request-Id: 7c7a5ace-7ffb-44e9-8950-330ccce929e3

{}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"retrieve-messages"}}>{`Retrieve messages`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To retrieve inbox messages, HTTP GET the inbox URL`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash"}}>{`http -v GET \$INBOX x-api-key:\$REFLEX_API_KEY
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`RESPONSE`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-json"}}>{`{
    "id": "https://example.com/inbox/",
    "contains": [
        {
            "id": "https://example.com/inbox/message-id",
            "type": "Notification",
            "timestamp": 1536555268275,
            "instrument": "https://yodata.io/vendor/app",
            "target": "https://example.com/inbox/",
            "object": {
              "foo": "bar"
            }
        }
    ]
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
